title: The Day the Bubble Burst
writer: Stanley R. Greenberg, Gordon Thomas (book), Max Morgan Witts (book)
actors: Blanche Baker, Franklin Cover, Richard Crenna, Dana Elcar
plot: A fictionalized account of how the 1929 stock market crash hurt the elite and the struggling, and the forces that may have caused the crash to occur.
name: The Day the Bubble Burst
